alternate_methods:
##Apply by post

To apply to transfer your registration by post, download the application form and send it to the DSA.

$D [Download ‘ADI 37EC - Application to transfer EC driving instructor registration to Great Britain register’ form (PDF, 380KB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa_adi_37ec.pdf "Download ‘ADI 37EC - Application to transfer EC driving instructor registration to Great Britain register’ form (PDF, 380KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

You’ll also need to send:

- a photocopy of your passport with the relevant residency page
- a photocopy of your EC driving instructor certificate
- a photocopy of your driving licence
- a short letter with details of your EC driving instruction career, including dates and qualifications gained
- a recent passport-sized photograph with your name written on the back

$A

EC ADI Applications
Driving Standards Agency
The Axis Building
112 Upper Parliament Street
Nottingham
NG1 6LP

$A

*[EC]: European Community
*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
introduction:
Transfer your European Community (EC) driving instructor registration to Great Britain. 

*[EC]: European Community
more_information:
It costs £300.

The online service is available from 6am to 11:30pm.

You’ll also need to send:

- a photocopy of your passport with the relevant residency page
- a photocopy of your EC driving instructor certificate
- a photocopy of your driving licence
- a short letter with details of your EC driving instruction career, including dates and qualifications gained
- a recent passport-sized photograph with your name written on the back

^ There's a different process to [transfer a Great Britain or European Union registration](http://www.dvtani.gov.uk/adi/gbeutransfers.asp "Transfer a Great Britain or European Union registration"){:rel="external"} to Northern Ireland. ^

*[EC]: European Community
overview: Transfer your European Community (EC) driving instructor registration to Great Britain.
title: Transfer your driving instructor registration to Great Britain
